message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity. The product we have to offer holds immense value, and I believe it could significantly benefit your endeavors. Our product is worth $1000000 to you, and we are eager to share its potential with you. We are offering this remarkable asset to you at a special price of $950000. This is an exclusive chance to acquire something truly exceptional at a favorable rate. Please let us know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
